arch_fix_8085.task:
Refactor session_assigner.py to be config-driven:

1. Create config/session_assigner.yaml with:
   - projects (edu_apps, kanbanflow, architect) with envs/scopes/ports/branches
   - rules (principles, prohibited, always) from SOP
   - session_routing prefixes
   - prompt_templates

2. Add ConfigLoader class to load YAML config
3. Replace hardcoded PROJECTS, EDU_FEATURE_ENVS, KANBAN_ENVS, ARCHITECT_SCOPES with config lookups
4. Update build_task_prompt to pull rules from config instead of duplicating SOP
5. Make paths dynamic using config + env vars (no hardcoded /Users/jgirmay paths)
6. Add --config CLI arg (default: config/session_assigner.yaml)

Config location: /Users/jgirmay/Desktop/gitrepo/pyWork/architect/config/session_assigner.yaml

Reference SOP at: /Users/jgirmay/Desktop/gitrepo/pyWork/architect/scripts/SOP.md

arch_fix_8082.task: Fix health check URLs in dashboard - change from absolute URLs (http://127.0.0.1:8080/health) to relative URLs (/health). The loadEnvironmentsStatus function at line 8756 is using 127.0.0.1 which gets blocked. Search for 127.0.0.1 in templates/dashboard.html and static/js files and replace with relative paths.

kanban_integration.task: Fix projects panel filters and archive feature

server_manager.task:
Verify all monitoring workers are functioning:

1. ERROR DETECTION WORKERS - Check workers that find and fix errors:
   - Verify error aggregation from /api/errors is working
   - Check if errors are being logged and grouped properly
   - Ensure error-to-bug conversion works

2. SERVER HEALTH WORKERS - Check workers that verify servers are running:
   - Test health checks on all ports: 5051-5058, 6051-6054, 8080-8085
   - Verify /api/system/health-matrix returns correct status
   - Check if offline services are detected

3. SESSION MONITORING - Check workers that detect stuck sessions:
   - Verify tmux session status detection (working/idle/stuck)
   - Check if sessions in loops are detected
   - Ensure /api/system/sessions/summary is accurate

4. FIX any workers that are not functioning properly

Test URLs:
- http://100.112.58.92:8080/api/errors
- http://100.112.58.92:8080/api/system/health-matrix
- http://100.112.58.92:8080/api/system/sessions/summary
- http://100.112.58.92:8080/api/system/decision-data
